Uses of Package
org.sql2o

  • Packages that use org.sql2o 
    Package Description
    org.sql2o
    Provides the main api for sql2o.
    org.sql2o.data
    Provides the model used by sql2o to represent a raw result set.
  • Classes in org.sql2o used by org.sql2o 
    Class and Description
    Connection
    Represents a connection to the database with a transaction.
    Query
    Represents a sql2o statement.
    QuirksMode
    Many JDBC drivers has quirks and needs special treatment.
    ResultSetIterable
    Iterable ResultSet.
    ResultSetIteratorBase
    Iterator for a ResultSet.
    Sql2o
    Sql2o is the main class for the sql2o library.
    Sql2oException
    Represents an exception thrown by Sql2o.
    StatementRunnable
    Represents a method with a Connection and an optional argument.
    StatementRunnableWithResult
    Represents a method with a Connection and an optional argument.
  • Classes in org.sql2o used by org.sql2o.data 
    Class and Description
    QuirksMode
    Many JDBC drivers has quirks and needs special treatment.
    ResultSetIterable
    Iterable ResultSet.
    ResultSetIteratorBase
    Iterator for a ResultSet.
